text: Leonard Richardson is a personal name that may refer to: *Leon Richardson (born 12 February 1957), Antiguan former cyclist *Len Richardson (athlete) (1881–1955), South African long-distance runner *Leonard Richardson (decathlete), Saint Kitts and Nevis. Bronze Medal winner at the 1986 Pan American Junior Athletics Championships *Leonard Richardson (industrialist), father of Milo Barnum Richardson *Leonard Richardson (record producer) (Nubian M.O.B.) *Leonard Richardson (video game developer). See Resource-oriented architecture, robotfindskitten
title: Leonard Richardson
